TopicTitle: Mod that toggles/displays nearest distantse between two vessels

Articles.Content:
I dislike using mechjeb for docking and i can dock pretty much anything, anywhere.

But one of the dependencies i have when docking manually, is that when using manouver nodes, i can see how big the distance is between the two vessels at a certain point. I have to hover my mouse over closest intersection to see the distance, then i have to slightly modify the manouvernode to see if this brings it closer or further apart, and move my mouse over to the closest intersection to check if im on the right track.

This is not only for docking, but for doing things like reduce Pe when aiming at a body far away from Kerbin. I dont want to stretch the manouver node, and then hover my mouse to see if i did it correctly, i want to stretch the manouver node and immideatly know if im modifying the orbit correctly. I dont even know if there is a stock feature that toggles this hover option on and off (i wish it was), but i am curious if there are any mods out there that does this little useful thing for me?

Its not easy to explain it clearly, so i can provide some pictures if you are having troubles understanding what im talking about

Thank you!
Kerbal Engineer Redux has the functionality you want... and then some.

I already use Kerbal Engineer Redux, but i can honestly say i have never seen this option

Under which menu can i find this option? Is it a toggle for the manouvernode or a display that showes up in the HUD?
